Class TameAction

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actions.Action
game.actions.TameAction
public class TameAction extends Action
Action to tame a Tameable actor. The actor performing this action becomes the owner of the target.

      public String execute(Actor actor, GameMap map)
